climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: Twisted tab DIY top finish Light weight voile sheer Comes as a pair
body.description: Soften your space with the Madison Park Ceres Twisted Tab Voile Sheer Window Pair. This soft panel pair provides a simple and airy update to your decor, with its lightweight voile sheer base and delicate color palette for the perfect ethereal touch. The DIY twist tab top creates beautiful and delicate folds for a stylish decorator's touch. This window panel is also OEKO-TEX certified, meaning it does not contain any harmful substances or chemicals, ensuring quality comfort and wellness. Machine washable and easy to hang, open, and close throughout the day and fits up to a 1.25" diameter rod. This window panel pair is perfect on its own for a soft filter or layer with others for a dramatic effect.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Madison Park DIY Twisted Tab Sheer Window Curtain Panel Pair Voile Privacy Drape for Bedroom, Livingroom, 50" x 95", White, 2 Count Soften your space with the Madison Park Ceres Twisted Tab Voile Sheer Window Pair. This white window pair provides a simple and airy update to your décor, with its lightweight voile sheer fabric and a weighted hem for providing easy draping and movement. The DIY twist tab top creates beautiful and delicate folds for a stylish decorator's touch. Machine washable and easy to hang, this window panel pair is perfect on its own for a soft filter or layer with others for a dramatic effect. Fits up to a 1.25” diameter rod. MATERIAL DETAILS: 100% Polyester. CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Machine Washable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and easy to knot
reviews.reviewText: I was holding off buying these curtains due to everyone having issues with the knot. I bought them anyways.. and its soo easy to knot! I love them and I get so many compliments!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty and quality curtains
reviews.reviewText: I found these curtains on multiple sites and Amazon had the best deal. They are very soft and sheer and just a hint of blush color. The tab tops are beautiful and really add something great. The instructions for them were confusing and I'm positive I did it wrong but that's the nice part about them- it doesn't really matter how you twist it as long as you do them all the same it turns out well lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars value for money
reviews.reviewText: the curtains are just as pictured. They were a great value and look beautiful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wasn't a fan of having to knot them myself. They look decent for the price and are sheer. They will do if I don't find something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely beautiful and very feminine.
reviews.reviewText: Color is more of a light peach. Making the knots on the top are a little confusing at first, then I got the hang of it. I love them!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars These curtains are ridiculous
reviews.reviewText: The most stupid design I could imagine. Nothing like pictured. You have to sit and twist those knots by hand, then they look very uneven and terrible. Probably made in china. What a waste of time. Sending back and looking for something decent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what I was looking for.
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something to dress up my large east facing dining room window but still allow the sun to shine through when not opened. The knots on the top had instructions and were easy to tie. I have had several complaints on the style. I did have to iron them because I could not get the wrinkles out in the dryer. I didn’t mind the ironing and it was very rewarding with the outcome.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Madison Park DIY Twisted Tab Sheer Window Curtain Panel Pair Vo
reviews.reviewText: The twist tie will take from the width of the curtain. Purchased sheer for my oversized sunroom not wanting to weigh down the room due to it being narrow. The twisted tab will work fine on my oversized windows. I purchased a set of 3 curtains 6 panels in all. 2 panels each at 50 x 84. The set of panels are running short due to the twisted tie. The French doors (the width of the entire door is 77.5 outer) and the panel looks too small per door at what should be 100 in width. I did not want to double up or half up due to the doors being open all summer long (remember going light). Also, I measured the curtains and they are not True to size Length and width off slightly but I was trying to cover the tops of the door opening due to appearance and that extra inch was needed. Glad I purchased tieback it makes them appear much nicer looking. All in all it softens the room and will appear breezy. Yes I will be keeping them and am fairly happy. It is a bit bohemian looking but my room was a little on the rustic side so it worked. Softened it right up. You may want to size up.

These are a tad bit shorter than I expected or wanted but still really nice. And also a good price since you’re getting 2 panels. I’m gave these 4 stars because the ties were confusing initially but after watching a YouTube video, I was able to create them.

reviews.reviewTitle: Zerknittert schiefe Nähte Made in China
reviews.reviewText: Made in China, wieso steht das nicht gleich dabei, Madison Park hört sich nicht nach China an, dann hätte ich nicht gekauft, billiger Stoff der knittert,es müsste dringend Bleiband rein, aber dafür ist die Gardine nicht genäht. Ich hoffe der Stoff hängt sich noch etwas glatt.Die Art mit den Schlaufen fand ich schön, schade das die Qualität so schlecht ist, unsaubere Nähte und 2 cm zu kurz.
